g.script: MD5=[7278a3688ce8ffe3755e999506e46cae] @startuml scale max 1920 width top to bottom direction skinparam nodesep 15 skinparam ranksep 30 skinparam monochrome true skinparam shadowing false skinparam defaultFontName Tahoma skinparam defaultFontSize 12 skinparam roundCorner 6 skinparam dpi 150 skinparam arrowColor black skinparam arrowThickness 0.5 skinparam packageTitleAlignment left skinparam usecase { borderThickness 0.5 } skinparam rectangle { borderThickness 0.5 } skinparam component { borderThickness 1 } package "Controllers" { (controllers/create) (controllers/delete) (controllers/read) (controllers/update) } package "Main" { (main) } package "Entities" { (Item) rectangle "itemSchema" as _itemSchema (itemValidator) } package "Frameworks" { (cleanCosmosDbItems) (createDb) rectangle "ItemDatabase" as _ItemDatabase rectangle "ItemDatabaseCosmosDB" as _ItemDatabaseCosmosDB rectangle "ItemDatabaseInMemory" as _ItemDatabaseInMemory (requestValidator) } package "Use cases" { (usecases/create) (usecases/delete) (usecases/read) (usecases/update) } package "Dependencies" { [@azure] } (controllers/create) --[thickness=1]> (main) (controllers/create) ----[thickness=1]> (requestValidator) (controllers/create) ---[thickness=1]> (usecases/create) (controllers/delete) --[thickness=1]> (main) (controllers/delete) ----[thickness=1]> (requestValidator) (controllers/delete) ---[thickness=1]> (usecases/delete) (controllers/read) --[thickness=1]> (main) (controllers/read) ----[thickness=1]> (requestValidator) (controllers/read) ---[thickness=1]> (usecases/read) (controllers/update) --[thickness=1]> (main) (controllers/update) ----[thickness=1]> (requestValidator) (controllers/update) ---[thickness=1]> (usecases/update) (createDb) ----> [@azure] (createDb) ..> _ItemDatabaseCosmosDB (createDb) ..> _ItemDatabaseInMemory (Item) ..> _itemSchema (Item) ..> (itemValidator) _ItemDatabaseCosmosDB ..> (cleanCosmosDbItems) _ItemDatabaseCosmosDB ..> _ItemDatabase _ItemDatabaseInMemory ..> _ItemDatabase (itemValidator) ..> _itemSchema (main) --> (createDb) (usecases/create) ---> (Item) (usecases/create) ---> _itemSchema @enduml ' View and edit on https://arkit.pro
